root.title: sara lee sle TO buy 34 pct OF dim
root.body: sara lee corp say agre buy 34 pct interest paris-bas dim s.a subsidiari bic s.a cost 84 mln dlr dim s.a hosieri manufactur 1985 sale 260 mln dlr the invest includ purchas 360,537 newli issu dim share valu 51 mln dlr loan 33 mln dlr say the loan convert addit 229,463 dim share note the propos agreement subject approv french govern say
